title: Panicked at exit
body:
```
thread 'pty reader' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Os { code: 2, kind: NotFound, message: "No such file or directory" }'
```

Which operating system does the issue occur on?
```
osx 10.14.2
rustc 1.32.0-nightly (4a45578bc 2018-12-07)
```
<details>
 <summary>Backtrace</summary>

